data.author: Helen Hayes
data.quote: The expert at anything was once a beginner

data.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

data.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.

data.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam
data.quote: All Birds find shelter during a rain. But Eagle avoids rain by flying above the Clouds.

data.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam
data.quote: Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy the success.

data.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam
data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun. First burn like a sun.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn’t matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we’ve done something wonderful… that’s what matters to me.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right. If you’re not passionate enough from the start, you’ll never stick it out.

data.author: M.S. Dhoni
data.quote: Till the full stop doesn't comes, the sentence doesn't completes.

data.author: M.S. Dhoni
data.quote: When you Die, you Die. You don't think a better way to do it.

data.author: M.S. Dhoni
data.quote: I have three Dogs at home. Even after losing a series or winning they treat me the same way.

data.author: M.S. Dhoni
data.quote: You don't play for the crowd, you play for the country.
